jd: From: ANIL, CDI Solutions Inc anil@cdisolutionsinc.com Reply to: anil@cdisolutionsinc.com Hi,Title : Lead -GCP Technical DeveloperExperience : 10+YearsLocation: Austin,TX/San Jose,CADuration: 12+Motnhs 9+ Years of Industry Work Experience in Data Engineering / ETL / BI• 5+ Years of experience in Big Data Stack – Hadoop, Hive, Spark (Python or Scala) along with basicshell-scripting and basic Python scripting• Very strong skills in SQL.• Should have bend of mind in understanding business data, product line, end to end flow of data,nature of data etc. from Business Perspective.• Experience extracting data from a variety of sources, and a desire to expand those skills (workingknowledge in SQL and Spark is mandatory)• Excellent Data Analysis skills. Must be comfortable with querying and analyzing large amount ofdata on Hadoop HDFS using Hive and Spark.• Preferably, the candidate must have experience building applications using Google CloudPlatform-related frameworks such as DataFlow/DataProc/PubSub.• Excellent Communication Skills to Understand and Pass on RequireD
